name: Brad & Eric Throwback 2017
description:
Throwback

Description

This game was built as an entry for the GitHub Game Off 2017. It is a retro-inspired 2D platform, based on some of our favorite games including many incarnations of Super Mario Brothers, Super Metroid, Mega Man X, Contra and others.

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys to move. Space to jump.
  • JKL to use weapons as you collect them.

Technology

This game was built using Unity Personal edition.

Credits

A game by Eric Mofield (art & game design) and Brad Shively (programming), with music contributed by Chris Larkin.

Other resources used in this game came from:

Eric Skiff

OpenGameArt Sound Effects

Sprites from misc. retro games

Thanks

Special thanks to GitHub and Lee Reilly
